events.message: I am reporting an auto accident that happened yesterday afternoon, where my car collided with another vehicle at the intersection causing significant damage.
The claim has been reviewed and properly categorized under auto accident due to the involvement of my vehicle in a collision.
An agent has been assigned to my claim and reached out promptly to discuss the next steps and required documentation.
Received confirmation that my auto accident claim has been acknowledged and is currently being processed in the system.
The insurance company requested all relevant documents including the police report, photos of the car damage, and repair estimates.
Submitted all requested documents related to the vehicle collision including police report, photos, and the initial repair bills to the agent.
The claim entered the investigation phase where the details of the auto accident and damages are being examined by the insurance team.
The investigation into the car accident has been completed, confirming liability and assessing the full extent of the damage sustained.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on the assessment of the damages and repair costs for the vehicle impacted in the collision.
Provided positive feedback on the handling of my auto accident claim, appreciating the transparency and responsiveness of the agent.
Received official notification that my auto accident claim has been approved and the compensation amount finalized for repair.
The claim payment has been issued to cover the repair costs of my vehicle following the approved auto accident insurance claim.
The auto accident claim has been officially closed after the payment was processed and all formalities were completed successfully.
All documentation and records related to my auto accident insurance claim have been archived for future reference and compliance.
